title: Real-Time Multiplayer
description: See other players move live, send messages, and connect via proximity-based voice and video chat inside the game world.

title: 23 Coding Challenges
description: Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced tiers with a built-in syntax-highlighted code editor. Solve them solo or with friends.

title: AI Tutor - Clawd
description: Get instant code reviews and hints from Clawd, an in-game AI tutor powered by Claude. Supports voice input and output.

title: 6 Unique Maps
description: From the Open Arena to The Library and The Workshop, each map has its own layout and feel to explore.

title: Map Editor
description: Paint barriers, spawn points, and terminals on a 50x50 grid. Import and export maps in ASCII format.

title: Play in Your Browser
description: Runs entirely in the browser with no download required. Just open the link and start playing.
